articles.title: 'Memorable for the wrong reasons': Couple's $2.2k Bulgari anniversary ring breaks after falling off table - AsiaOne
articles.description: When you fork out thousands for a luxury brand item, the least you can expect is for it to last. Unfortunately, that was not the case for Stomp contributor Joel and his partner, who had splashed out $4,400 on a pair of rings from Italian luxury brand Bulgari …
articles.content:
When you fork out thousands for a luxury brand item, the least you can expect is for it to last.

articles.title: Mercedes pulls ad amid debate over model's eyes - News24
articles.description: Mercedes-Benz removed a video advertisement from a Chinese social media website, state media said, after the clip got swept up in a charged national debate over depictions of Asian-looking features by foreign companies.
articles.content: Mercedes-Benz removed a video advertisement from a Chinese social media website, state media said, after the clip got swept up in a charged national debate over depictions of Asian-looking features b… [+3259 chars]
